function.name: google
function.description: Searches Google for the specified query and returns search results.

query.description: The search query to submit to Google.

num_results.description: The number of search results to return. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

recency.description: Optional parameter to filter results by recency. Valid values include 'hour', 'day', 'week', 'month', or 'year'.

language.description: Optional parameter to specify the language of the search results. Defaults to 'en' (English) if not specified.

region.description: Optional parameter to specify the regional domain for the search results. Defaults to 'US' if not specified.
